type Permission struct {
    ID          string
    Name        string
    Description string
}

<a name="Role"></a>
## type [Role](<https://github.com/aaronlmathis/gosight-server/blob/main/internal/usermodel/user.go#L30-L35>)



```go
type Role struct {
    ID          string
    Name        string
    Description string
    Permissions []Permission
}
```

## type [SafeUser](<https://github.com/aaronlmathis/gosight-server/blob/main/internal/usermodel/user.go#L23-L28>)



```go
type SafeUser struct {
    Username  string `json:"username"`
    Email     string `json:"email"`
    FirstName string `json:"firstName"`
    LastName  string `json:"lastName"`
}
```

<a name="User"></a>
## type [User](<https://github.com/aaronlmathis/gosight-server/blob/main/internal/usermodel/user.go#L5-L22>)



```go
type User struct {
    ID            string
    Username      string
    Email         string
    PasswordHash  string
    FirstName     string
    LastName      string
    MFAEnabled    bool
    MFAMethod     string // "totp", "webauthn"
    TOTPSecret    string
    WebAuthnCreds []byte
    SSOProvider   string
    SSOID         string
    Roles         []Role
    CreatedAt     time.Time
    LastLogin     time.Time
    Scopes        map[string][]string
}
```
